sections.heading: General; special counsel; appoint; fees allowed; taxed as costs
sections.text: The Attorney General may appoint special counsel to prosecute the action as provided for in section 81-885.22, and all fees allowed to the receiver and to counsel so appointed shall be taxed as costs in such action as the court may dire

81-885.23.Attorney General; special counsel; appoint; fees allowed; taxed as costs.

The Attorney General may appoint special counsel to prosecute the action as provided for in section 81-885.22, and all fees allowed to the receiver and to counsel so appointed shall be taxed as costs in such action as the court may direct.

SourceLaws 1973, LB 68, ยง 23.
